articles.title: Stillwater: Matt Damon goes full MAGA in drama that might just get him an Oscar - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: REVIEW: Hollywood hasn't had much time or empathy for the illiberal, white American male recently, but this might help to balance the ledger a little.
articles.content:
Stillwater (M, 139 mins) Directed by Tom McCarthy ***½
 In the French city of Marseilles, a young American woman languishes in prison.

articles.title: Taliban Advances in Afghanistan Could Bring Political Peril for Biden - The New York Times
articles.description: The president had hoped to win credit for ending one of America’s “forever wars.” But new risks are coming into view.
articles.content: I think that the American public is much more likely to see whats happening right now, as tragic and worrisome as it is, as ultimately the failure of two decades of war and occupation in Afghanistan,… [+1200 chars]
